briefTitle: Use of N-Acetylcysteine (NAC) in Fingernail Biting
officialTitle: A Randomized Placebo-controlled Trial of N-Acetylcysteine in Onychophagia
summary: To conduct a pilot randomized placebo-controlled feasibility trial of N-acetylcysteine (NAC) in onychophagia, preliminarily assessing the tolerability and effects of this pharmacotherapy on young adults who bite their fingernails. It is proposed that NAC will help decrease fingernail biting.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Enrolled Within One Year
